title: Pasta Bolognese
description: Very delicious as well as filling dinner, can be easily cooked far in advance.
story:
This is a good recipe to cook for a big family gathering. Bolognese sauce tastes the same after defrosting, so I usually make twice bigger bowl and freeze it for super quick future dinners.

In this photo pasta is seasoned with grated cheddar, although I prefer Parmigiano instead.

ingredients.name: spaghetti
ingredients.preparationNotes: (I guess there is 1 pound in a box usually)

instructions: Cook spagetthi as it is adviced on packaging.
Souté finely chopped onion on some olive oil.
Add grated carrot. Souté for 7 minutes.
Add beef to the pan, mix well with onion and carrot, try to break all crumbs. Add salt, pepper, herbs and dried paprika.
Add canned tomatoes, beef broth. And cook for 20 minutes.
You can either mix past with souce before serving or serve sauce on top of spagetthi and sprinkle with grated cheese.
